event.title: came under rule of the Burmese from Bagan in 1056

data.event: The area came under rule of the Burmese from Bagan in 1056.
After the collapse of Bagan to the Mongols in 1287, the Mon regained their independence.

event.title: were engaged in the Forty Years

data.event: During the reign of King Razadarit, Bago and Ava Kingdom were engaged in the Forty Years' War.
